title: Model input source
description: Represents input files of 'type', which will be converted to tensors and bound to a specific model input.

files.$comment: A list of files designated to infer for a specific model input

shape.$comment: Is allowed only for 'type' of 'bin': specifies a shape of a binary blob

layout.$comment: Is allowed only for 'type' of 'bin': specifies a layout of a binary blob

element_type.$comment: Is allowed only for 'type' of 'bin': specifies an data type of a binary blob

convert.$comment: Optional. it is allowed only for 'type' of 'image': specifies desired tensors attributes which initial images must be converted to

then.$comment: When 'type' is 'image', these properties are forbidden

else.$comment: When 'type' is 'bin', thes properties are forbidden
